instruction: Consider this situation. Customer is ready to pay $13 for my product but we are not able to raise invoice for less than $20. So in this situation, act like a top sales person & closing expert & give me an email copy to upsell this customer with another $13 product so that it can create a win win situation.
output:
Subject: Complimentary Add-On for Your Order

Dear [Customer's Name],

Thank you for your interest in our product and for placing an order with us. We appreciate your business and are committed to providing you with the best possible experience.

We understand that you are looking to purchase our product for $13. However, due to our company policy, we are unable to raise an invoice for less than $20. We want to ensure that you receive the best value for your money, and we believe that our other products may be of interest to you.

We have a complementary add-on product that we would like to offer you at no additional cost. This product is designed to enhance the functionality of the one you have already selected and will provide you with even greater benefits.

Here are the details of the add-on product:

[Product Name]: [Product Description]

Price: $13

By adding this product to your order, you will receive a complete solution that meets all your needs and exceeds your expectations. This will also help us to meet our minimum invoice requirement.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with the add-on product. We will update your invoice accordingly and ensure that you receive the best possible value for your money.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. We look forward to serving you.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Your Company]

This email copy is designed to address the situation where a customer is ready to pay for a product, but the company's policy requires a minimum invoice amount. By offering a complementary add-on product, the customer can still receive the product they want while meeting the company's policy requirements. The email copy is polite, professional, and provides all the necessary information to the customer, making it easy for them to make a decision.
